session_info.name: THXB - Invited Oral Presentations, Applications, Tech Transfer and Industrial Relations

papers.title: Applications of e-Linacs, From Very Low and Low to Very High Energy, and From Warm to SC Technologies
authors: An overview of the electron linacs either warm and SC technologies focused on applications of very low (5 MeV)
medium and high-energy (300 MeV) for industrial
environmental and society has to be given. Identify existing and emerging needs in the area. The technical challenges
technology gaps and emerging needs from the point of view of accelerators applications have to be described.
